EmailTemplate.description: Bus Ops approver approves the deal
EmailTemplate.name: Bus Ops approver defers the deal to Distributor PRM
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Deal Reg: “{!Lead.Deal_Name__c}” has been approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.OwnerId},
Your Deal Reg: “{!Lead.Deal_Name__c}” has been approved, but a decision on Deal Origination Discount has been deferred pending additional analysis. The deal can now be converted to an opportunity.
Please Click on the link below to access the Deal Reg details. {!$Label.Partner_email_community_URL}/{!Lead.Id}
Best Regards, Nokia PRM Sales Team
